p: In this study, the amino acid residues present at the active site of the proteases were predicted and determined from the related literature, using the metaPocket server (Huang, 2009; Morris et al., 2009) and through the Biovia Discovery Studio Visualizer 2020 (Design, 2014). The determination of the amino acids in the active site was used to analyze the Grid box and to carry out site-specific docking. Discovery Studio is an offline life sciences software that provides tools for protein, ligand and pharmacophore modeling (Hastantram et al., 2020).
